mapper.select: SELECT ID, COMPANY_ID, POSITION_NAME, POSITION_INFO, POSITION_DUE_DATE, POSITION_OPEN_DATE, POSITION_STATUS, MID_CATEGORY_ID FROM TBL_POSITION

SELECT P.ID, P.COMPANY_ID,P.POSITION_NAME,P.POSITION_INFO, P.POSITION_DUE_DATE ,P.POSITION_OPEN_DATE ,P.POSITION_STATUS,P.MID_CATEGORY_ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, MC.MID_CATEGORY_NAME, C.MEMBER_ID,C.COMPANY_ADDRESS FROM TBL_COMPANY C JOIN TBL_POSITION P ON P.COMPANY_ID = C.ID JOIN TBL_MID_CATEGORY MC ON P.MID_CATEGORY_ID = MC.ID

SELECT P.ID, P.COMPANY_ID,P.POSITION_NAME,P.POSITION_INFO, P.POSITION_DUE_DATE ,P.POSITION_OPEN_DATE ,P.POSITION_STATUS,P.MID_CATEGORY_ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, MC.MID_CATEGORY_NAME, C.MEMBER_ID,C.COMPANY_ADDRESS FROM TBL_COMPANY C JOIN TBL_POSITION P ON P.COMPANY_ID = C.ID JOIN TBL_MID_CATEGORY MC ON P.MID_CATEGORY_ID = MC.ID WHERE MC.BIG_CATEGORY_ID = #{id}

SELECT P.ID, P.COMPANY_ID,P.POSITION_NAME,P.POSITION_INFO, P.POSITION_DUE_DATE ,P.POSITION_OPEN_DATE ,P.POSITION_STATUS,P.MID_CATEGORY_ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, MC.MID_CATEGORY_NAME,C.MEMBER_ID,C.COMPANY_ADDRESS FROM TBL_COMPANY C JOIN TBL_POSITION P ON P.COMPANY_ID = C.ID JOIN TBL_MID_CATEGORY MC ON P.MID_CATEGORY_ID = MC.ID WHERE P.ID = #{id}

SELECT P.ID, P.COMPANY_ID,P.POSITION_NAME,P.POSITION_INFO, P.POSITION_DUE_DATE ,P.POSITION_OPEN_DATE ,P.POSITION_STATUS,P.MID_CATEGORY_ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, MC.MID_CATEGORY_NAME,C.MEMBER_ID, C.COMPANY_ADDRESS FROM TBL_COMPANY C JOIN TBL_POSITION P ON P.COMPANY_ID = C.ID JOIN TBL_MID_CATEGORY MC ON P.MID_CATEGORY_ID = MC.ID ORDER BY POSITION_OPEN_DATE DESC

SELECT P.ID, P.COMPANY_ID,P.POSITION_NAME,P.POSITION_INFO, P.POSITION_DUE_DATE ,P.POSITION_OPEN_DATE ,P.POSITION_STATUS,P.MID_CATEGORY_ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, MC.MID_CATEGORY_NAME,C.COMPANY_ADDRESS FROM TBL_COMPANY C JOIN TBL_POSITION P ON P.COMPANY_ID = C.ID JOIN TBL_MID_CATEGORY MC ON P.MID_CATEGORY_ID = MC.ID ORDER BY POSITION_OPEN_DATE ASC

SELECT MID_CATEGORY_NAME, COMPANY_NAME, POSITION_NAME FROM ( SELECT P.ID,P.POSITION_NAME,C.COMPANY_NAME ,MC.MID_CATEGORY_NAME FROM TBL_POSITION P JOIN TBL_MID_CATEGORY MC ON P.MID_CATEGORY_ID = MC.ID JOIN TBL_COMPANY C ON P.COMPANY_ID = C.ID )
WHERE MID_CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR COMPANY_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR POSITION_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
